articles.author: Catherine Shoard
articles.title: ‘There’s nothing intimate about filming a sex scene’: Daniel Craig opens up about new film Queer - The Guardian
articles.description: The Bond actor plays an American expat who begins an affair with a young student in the 1950s-set film from Call Me By Your Name director Luca Guadagnino
articles.content:
Daniel Craig has spoken about filming explicit sex scenes for Luca Guadagninos Queer at the Venice film festival, ahead of its premiere on Tuesday.
An adaptation of the William Burroughs novel of th… [+3622 chars]
